item.title: When More Bandwidth Doesnâ€™t Help
item.description:
You’re likely aware of this situation: your reliable internet connection, a T1 line or DS3 circuit, has suddenly become sluggish. Your VoIP calls sound distant, employees struggle to work, and frustrated customers can’t even communicate properly. The obvious solution seems to be getting more bandwidth, right? While that seems logical, doubling your internet speed might not solve the problem, leaving you with the same issues and double the cost. Why is that?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/when-more-bandwidth-doesn-t-help/
